channel.title: ~2 Simple Questions about Moparclassic~
channel.description:
1. How do I edit the play files for moparclassic? I have asked this question 3 times now, nothing is working. What do i use to open it with? nothing seems to work :S
2. Has anyone figured out a way to unpack the client's conf files (i dont even know where they are located in the client)? If so, could you tell me how? Thanks

item.title: ~2 Simple Questions about Moparclassic~
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

  1. If you’re using the default implementation, you do it at runtime. You’ve been told this 3 times now. If you want to, use a different implementation.
  2. I believe tx posted how to do it somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: ~2 Simple Questions about Moparclassic~
item.dc:creator: @RylandAlmanza RylandAlmanza
item.description:
@RylandAlmanza wrote:

  1. I could be wrong, but I think all that data is stored in the mysql database you set up, isn’t it?
  2. This doesn’t really answer your question, but I think you should use the DarkQuest client to connect to your MoparClassic server. I tried the MoparClassic client, and I didn’t like it as much.

Sorry I can’t really help very much. I’m just figuring everything out right now like you are.

Read full topic
